name: Postgres
description: Advanced open-source RDBMS.

name: MySQL
description: Popular open-source RDBMS for web apps.

name: Microsoft SQL Server
description: Commercial RDBMS for .NET ecosystems.

name: MongoDB
description: Popular document-oriented NoSQL database.

name: Amazon DynamoDB
description: Managed NoSQL key-value and document database.

name: Redis (as KV)
description: In-memory key-value store.

name: Apache Cassandra
description: Distributed wide-column store for high availability.

name: Neo4j
description: The most popular native graph database.

name: Amazon Neptune
description: Managed graph database service.

name: Pinecone
description: Managed vector database for AI similarity search.

name: Weaviate
description: Open-source vector search engine with graph features.

name: Milvus
description: Open-source vector database for large-scale AI.

name: InfluxDB
description: Open-source time-series database.

name: Prometheus (Storage)
description: Time-series database for monitoring and alerting.

name: Apache Kafka
description: Distributed streaming platform (durable log).

name: RabbitMQ
description: A robust message broker (AMQP).

name: Apache Pulsar
description: Streaming and queuing platform.

name: AWS EventBridge
description: Managed serverless event bus.

name: Redis (as Cache)
description: In-memory data structure store, used as a cache.

name: Memcached
description: High-performance, distributed memory object caching system.

name: Elasticsearch
description: Distributed search and analytics engine.

name: Apache Solr
description: Open-source enterprise search platform.

name: Kubernetes
description: Container orchestration platform.

name: HashiCorp Nomad
description: A simpler, flexible workload orchestrator.

name: Istio
description: Powerful service mesh with a focus on security and control.

name: Linkerd
description: Ultralight, fast service mesh with a focus on simplicity.

name: Cloud API Gateway
description: Managed service (e.g., AWS API Gateway, Apigee).

name: Kong
description: Open-source, self-hosted API gateway.

name: Cloud Object Storage
description: Scalable object storage (e.g., AWS S3, GCS, Azure Blob).

name: MinIO
description: High-performance, S3-compatible, self-hosted object storage.

name: Apache Spark
description: Unified engine for large-scale data processing.

name: Apache Flink
description: Stream processing framework with powerful state management.

name: Enterprise Service Bus
description: Centralized bus (e.g., MuleSoft, TIBCO).

name: Cloud Data Warehouse
description: Managed columnar database (e.g., Redshift, BigQuery, Snowflake).

name: ClickHouse
description: Open-source, high-performance columnar database for OLAP.

name: In-Memory Data Grid
description: Distributed in-memory store (e.g., Hazelcast, Apache Ignite).

name: Datadog
description: Managed observability platform.

name: Prometheus (Stack)
description: Open-source monitoring and alerting toolkit.
